# Latch Switch

Using a NE555 in bistable mode to act as a latch switch or better known as a toggle button.

## Simulation

[View Simulation](https://www.falstad.com/circuit/circuitjs.html?ctz=CQAgjCAMB0l3BWcAOZ0AsBOAbJyAmAZm3UPUkxAUqQUioFMBaMMAKACUQB2fe--3uEMWBVxEwKFUyQA)
